{{cpp/container/mdspan/extents/title|''fwd-prod-of-extents''}}
{{cpp/container/mdspan/extents/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++23|notes={{mark expos}}|
constexpr std::size_t /*fwd-prod-of-extents*/( rank_type i ) const noexcept;
}}

Returns the product of the sizes of extents with index less than {{c|i}}. The behavior is undefined if {{c|1=i &lt;= rank()}} is {{c/core|false}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|i|The end index of the range of extents to be multiplied together.}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
If {{c|i &gt; 0}} is {{c/core|true}}, return the product of {{box|{{rlpt|extent}}{{c/core|(k)}}}} for all {{tt|k}} in range {{range plain|0|i}}, otherwise {{c|1}}.
